alert.note: Alert for Schuyler; Steuben; Yates (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 11:49PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Schuyler, southern Yates and northeastern Steuben Counties through 1230 AM EDT... At 1149 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Urbana, or 12 miles west of Dundee, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hector, Starkey, Urbana, Watkins Glen, Dundee, Montour Falls, Hornby, Tyrone, Pulteney and Wheeler. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
